title: What is the difference between a naturopath and a holistic nutritionist?
description: Answer: A naturopath is a kind of doctor that uses naturopathic techniques, many of which are scientifically implausible or unproven, like homeopathy and acupuncture. The exact meaning of naturopath depends on where you are. Some areas require a naturopath to have graduated from an approved schoo...
